eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: CEB and its subsidiaries agree that any disputes regarding its privacy policies and related actions regarding data from Europe can be heard by the European Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) or the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC), and we will be subject to the determinations of those bodies. Any complaints about CEB's adherence to the practices described in its privacy policy statement or non-compliance with the Safe Harbor Principles should first be addressed to Lisa Branco at lbranco@executiveboard.com.
